trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the information needed when creating a control.
trans-unit.target: 封装创建控件时所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: The information in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> can be used to pass information about the initial state and appearance of a control.
trans-unit.target: 中的信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>可以用于传递有关的初始状态和控件的外观的信息。

trans-unit.source: Most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> derived controls override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property to pass in the appropriate values or include additional information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>.
trans-unit.target: 大多数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>派生控件重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>属性，以传入适当的值或包含中的其他信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The constants used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A> properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置的常量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A>参见 Winuser.h 标头文件中定义属性。

trans-unit.source: This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 通过平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装了此文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> derived class named `MyIconButton` and provides the implementation needed for the button to display an Icon rather than an Image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>派生类名为`MyIconButton`并提供所需的按钮以显示图标而不是映像的实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property is extended and a value added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A> property that causes the button to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> rather than an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>扩展属性和值添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>属性导致该按钮显示<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>而非<xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control and an instance of the derived control, `MyIconButton`, created in the example above.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个标准的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件和派生的控件中，一个实例`MyIconButton`上面的示例中创建。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that there is an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> file named Default.ico in the same location as the application.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要有<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>名为 Default.ico 中与应用程序相同的位置的文件。

trans-unit.source: When the application starts, the `Default` icon is displayed on the `MyIconButton` button.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序启动时，则`Default`上显示的图标`MyIconButton`按钮。

trans-unit.source: If the `Default` icon is not present, the button face is blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Default`图标不存在，该按钮图标为空白。

trans-unit.source: When the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog> box will appear so you can select a new Icon to display on the `MyIconButton`.
trans-unit.target: 当标准<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>单击后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>框会显示，因此你可以选择新的图标上显示`MyIconButton`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control's initial text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的初始文本。

trans-unit.source: The control's initial text.
trans-unit.target: 控件的初始文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Windows class to derive the control from.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置从中派生该控件的 Windows 类的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Windows class to derive the control from.
trans-unit.target: 从中派生该控件的 Windows 类的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `null`, indicating that the control is not derived from an existing control class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`null`，指示该控件不从现有控件类派生。

trans-unit.source: To derive from an existing control class, store the system class name in this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要从现有控件类派生，请在此属性中存储系统类的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, to derive from the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, set this property to "BUTTON".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要派生自标准<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件中，将此属性设置为"按钮"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a bitwise combination of class style values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置类样式值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the class style values.
trans-unit.target: 类样式值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A> property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> property is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A>如果忽略属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>属性不是`null`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The constants used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A> properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置的常量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A>参见 Winuser.h 标头文件中定义属性。

trans-unit.source: This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 通过平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装了此文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a bitwise combination of extended window style values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置扩展窗口样式值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the extended window style values.
trans-unit.target: 扩展窗口样式值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A> property supports extended appearance and initial state values to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>属性支持扩展的外观和初始状态的值应用于控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The constants used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A> properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置的常量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A>参见 Winuser.h 标头文件中定义属性。

trans-unit.source: This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 通过平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装了此文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial height of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的初始高度。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the initial height of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件初始高度的数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets additional parameter information needed to create the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置创建控件所需的附加参数信息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that holds additional parameter information needed to create the control.
trans-unit.target: 存放创建控件所需附加参数信息的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a multiple document interface (MDI) client window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Param%2A> property must reference a `CLIENTCREATESTRUCT` structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建多文档界面 (MDI) 客户端窗口，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Param%2A>属性必须引用`CLIENTCREATESTRUCT`结构。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CLIENTCREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CLIENTCREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control's parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的父级。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that contains the window handle of the control's parent.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />，它包含控件的父级的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a bitwise combination of window style values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗口样式值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the window style values.
trans-unit.target: 窗口样式值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A> property controls the appearance of the control and its initial state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>属性控制的控制和它的初始状态的外观。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The constants used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A> properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置的常量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassStyle%2A>参见 Winuser.h 标头文件中定义属性。

trans-unit.source: This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 通过平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装了此文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> derived class named `MyIconButton` and provides the implementation needed for the button to display an icon rather than an image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>派生类名为`MyIconButton`并提供所需的按钮以显示图标而不是映像的实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property is extended and a value added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A> property that causes the button to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> rather than an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>扩展属性和值添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>属性导致该按钮显示<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>而非<xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的初始宽度。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the initial width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件初始宽度的数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial left position of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的初始左边位置。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the initial left position of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件初始左边位置的数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top position of the initial location of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的初始顶部位置。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the top position of the initial location of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件初始顶部位置的数值。
